## types.PropType type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type PropType<T, Path extends string> = Path extends keyof T ? T[Path] : Path extends `${infer K}.${infer RT}` ? K extends keyof T ? PropType<T[K], RT> : unknown : unknown;
```
